statements.select: SELECT OrderID,OrderNo,TotalSellPrice,ActualSellPrice,DiscountPrice,CutOffPrice,ServiceFee,PaymentMoney,NeedChangePay,DeviceNo,DeskName,WorkSequence,TranSequence,EatType,[Status], SubOrderNo,PeopleNum,MembershipCard,MemberDiscount,InputEmployeeID,InputEmployeeNo,PayEmployeeID,PayEmployeeNo,CheckoutDeviceNo FROM [Order] WHERE DeskName = #value# AND ([Status] = 0 OR [Status] = 3) AND IsVoided = 0
statements.update: UPDATE [Order] SET TotalSellPrice = #TotalSellPrice#, ActualSellPrice = #ActualSellPrice#, DiscountPrice = #DiscountPrice#, CutOffPrice = #CutOffPrice#, ServiceFee = #ServiceFee#, DeskName = #DeskName#, PeopleNum = #PeopleNum#, InputEmployeeID = #EmployeeID#, InputEmployeeNo = #EmployeeNo#, LastModifiedTime = getdate() , LastModifiedEmployeeID = #EmployeeID# WHERE OrderID = #OrderID#
UPDATE [Order] SET TotalSellPrice = #TotalSellPrice#, ActualSellPrice = #ActualSellPrice#, DiscountPrice = #DiscountPrice#, CutOffPrice = #CutOffPrice# WHERE OrderID = #OrderID#

UPDATE [Order] SET TotalSellPrice = #TotalSellPrice#, ActualSellPrice = #ActualSellPrice#, DiscountPrice = #DiscountPrice#, CutOffPrice = #CutOffPrice#, ServiceFee = #ServiceFee#, MembershipCard = #MembershipCard#, MemberDiscount = #MemberDiscount#, [Status] = 3 WHERE OrderID = #OrderID#

UPDATE [Order] SET TotalSellPrice = #TotalSellPrice#, ActualSellPrice = #ActualSellPrice#, DiscountPrice = #DiscountPrice#, CutOffPrice = #CutOffPrice#, ServiceFee = #ServiceFee#, PaymentMoney = #PaymentMoney#, NeedChangePay = #NeedChangePay#, PayTime = getdate(), LastModifiedTime = getdate() , PayEmployeeID = #PayEmployeeID#, PayEmployeeNo = #PayEmployeeNo#, LastModifiedEmployeeID = #PayEmployeeID#, [Status] = 1, MembershipCard = #MembershipCard#, MemberDiscount = #MemberDiscount#, CheckoutDeviceNo = #CheckoutDeviceNo# WHERE OrderID = #OrderID#

UPDATE [Order] SET TotalSellPrice = #TotalSellPrice#, ActualSellPrice = #ActualSellPrice#, DiscountPrice = #DiscountPrice#, CutOffPrice = #CutOffPrice#, ServiceFee = #ServiceFee#, PaymentMoney = #PaymentMoney#, NeedChangePay = #NeedChangePay#, LastModifiedEmployeeID = #EmployeeID#, LastModifiedTime = getdate(), Transfered = 0 WHERE OrderID = #OrderID#

UPDATE [Order] SET AuthorisedManager = #AuthorisedManager#, CancelEmployeeNo = #CancelEmployeeNo#, CancelReasonName = #CancelReasonName#, [Status] = 2, IsVoided = 1, LastModifiedEmployeeID = #AuthorisedManager#, LastModifiedTime = getdate(), Transfered = 0 WHERE OrderID = #OrderID#

UPDATE [Order] SET TotalSellPrice = #TotalSellPrice#, ActualSellPrice = #ActualSellPrice#, DiscountPrice = #DiscountPrice#, CutOffPrice = #CutOffPrice#, PeopleNum = #PeopleNum# WHERE OrderID = #OrderID#
UPDATE [Order] SET DeskName = #DeskName#, SubOrderNo = #SubOrderNo# WHERE OrderID = #OrderID#
statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 SubOrderNo FROM [Order] WHERE DeskName = #value# AND [Status] = 0 AND IsVoided = 0 ORDER BY SubOrderNo DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM [Order] WHERE PayTime BETWEEN #BeginTime# AND #EndTime#
statements.update: UPDATE [Order] SET DeliveryTime = GETDATE() , DeliveryEmployeeNo = #EmployeeNo# WHERE OrderID = #OrderID#

SELECT OrderID, PayTime, TranSequence, EatType, DeliveryTime FROM [Order] WHERE DailyStatementNo = #DailyStatementNo# AND [Status] = 0 AND EatType = 2
